18 template <class ObserverComponent>
19 class TModelObserverCompWrap: public ObserverComponent
20 {
21 public:
22  typedef ObserverComponent BaseClass;
23 
24  I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TModelObserverCompWrap);
25  I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(imod::IObserver);
26  I_ASSIGN(m_defaultModelCompPtr, "DefaultModel", "Data model to be connected to the observer", false, "DefaultModel");
27  I_TASSIGN_TO(m_defaultObjectCompPtr, m_defaultModelCompPtr, false);
28  I_END_COMPONENT;
29 
30 protected:
31  // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
32  virtual void OnComponentCreated();
33  virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
34 
35 private:
36  I_REF(imod::IModel, m_defaultModelCompPtr);
37  I_TREF(typename ObserverComponent::ModelType, m_defaultObjectCompPtr);
38 };

41 // protected methods

43 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)

45 template <class ObserverComponent>
46 void TModelObserverCompWrap<ObserverComponent>::OnComponentCreated()
47 {
48  BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
49 
50  I_IF_DEBUG(
51  if (m_defaultModelCompPtr.IsValid() && !m_defaultObjectCompPtr.IsValid()){
52  const icomp::IComponentContext* contextPtr = BaseClass::GetComponentContext();
53  QByteArray observerComponentId = "(unidentified)";
54  if (contextPtr != NULL){
55  const icomp::CComponentContext* extContextPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::CComponentContext*>(contextPtr);
56  if (extContextPtr != NULL){
57  observerComponentId = extContextPtr->GetCompleteContextId();
58  }
59  else{
60  observerComponentId = contextPtr->GetContextId();
61  }
62  }
63 
64  QByteArray modelComponentId = "(unidentified)";
65 
66  icomp::IComponent* modelComponentPtr = dynamic_cast<icomp::IComponent*>(m_defaultModelCompPtr.GetPtr());
67  if (modelComponentPtr != NULL){
68  const icomp::IComponentContext* modelContextPtr = modelComponentPtr->GetComponentContext();
69  if (modelContextPtr != NULL){
70  const icomp::CComponentContext* extModelContextPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::CComponentContext*>(modelContextPtr);
71  if (extModelContextPtr != NULL){
72  modelComponentId = extModelContextPtr->GetCompleteContextId();
73  }
74  else{
75  modelComponentId = modelContextPtr->GetContextId();
76  }
77  }
78  }
79 
80  QString exptectedObjectInterface = typeid(typename ObserverComponent::ModelType).name();
81 
82  qDebug("Component %s: Component model %s doesn't implement observed interface %s",
83  qPrintable(observerComponentId),
84  qPrintable(modelComponentId),
85  qPrintable(exptectedObjectInterface));
86  }
87  )
88 
89  if (m_defaultModelCompPtr.IsValid() && m_defaultObjectCompPtr.IsValid()){
90  m_defaultModelCompPtr->AttachObserver(this);
91  }
92 }
93 
94 
95 template <class ObserverComponent>
96 void TModelObserverCompWrap<ObserverComponent>::OnComponentDestroyed()
97 {
98  if (m_defaultModelCompPtr.IsValid() && m_defaultModelCompPtr->IsAttached(this)){
99  m_defaultModelCompPtr->DetachObserver(this);
100  }
101 
102  BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
103 }
104 
105 
106 } // namespace ibase
